column5: ....Nice to have you on board Paul.

WELCOME PAUL!......congrats on the PB musky!!!  Loving the pics.   Thats a nice pike in the ice pi....with all the snow on the ice....i'm guessing last year?...lol....hope we get a little less of the white stuff, at least till we have a good 8" - 10".   Cant wait to see some great ice fishin' pics.   Simon.   (ps....that bass is really dark...there is a lake near me where they're dark , but that is BLACK!)
two newbies @ the site!  lets hope we ''FIT'' in (whitespinnerbait)!  nice year end ! trully cant wait for the ice to freez up!  lets hope its black ice and not the slush like we had last year!

WOW , what a great site guys and gals .............. With the soft water season coming to an end,, I'm finally going to take the time to join OFC which was highly recommended to me by my good friend and neighbour Leechman. I took a quick look through some of the reports Pretty impressive to say the least. ie some of those trout and salmon  reports ,, Very very nice .  Myself its been one of my best season's ever , like hooking into my first Muskie ever , somewhere around a 25lber ( thanks to that TroutnMuskiehunter Dude ) . Anyway to keep it short and sweet i'm looking forward to participating with the OFC Crew .  I'll post some pics when i get this computer flaw straightened out.   Got it fixed up now  LMB    Northern Pike    One caught on ice     Smallmouth      Hope you enjoy
Welcome to the Community!  Look forward to seeing some of your pictures and getting to know you.   25 lb musky for your first?  Way to set the bar!!  Congrats!
Congrats on your first ski, and welcome to the board.

Welcome to OFC Paul     Great intro but before someone tells you.... We love pics and I know you have plenty    heck I've taken a lot of them  You won't regret it Looking forward to your futur reports Jacques
Welcome to the OFC look forward to reading your reports  Rob
Welcome along! Hope you enjoy it here.

Hey Paul.... here, I'll give you a hand on the pics department  Everyone, here is Paul's PB Ski, first ever and I was standing next to him when caught it  If I remember correctly, it was 44" long x 22" girth Here it is..... enjoy!    Leechman
Welcome. Nice ski. I am going to get one of those next year
Nice 1st ski Paul!  I'm still in the 0-4 club, 0 ski's for how many cast's now?  Welcome to the site, it's a great group here.
Now that's a gator!  Welcome, you'll do just fine.  Looking forward to some more reports.

Welcome to the board!! Pull up a chair and stay a while.  Check out our OFC theme song if you haven't heard it yet...pretty much sums it all up....  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=20250
Welcome aboard!!
Welcome aboard man, great looking pics, nice and healthy fish!
Welcome aboard paul !!!! im warning you right now....this place is very addictive !!! lots of good freinds & great times lay ahead for you ....nice fish porn you have there...cheers
Welcome aboard Paul. Glad you finally made it in. Looking forward to hearing of your adventures.
Welcome Paul.  Pretty impressive way to start off.  Looks like you had a great season
thats what i like to see, some nice big largemouths. Welcome to OFC!
Welcome Aboard!
Welcome whitespinnerbait,  All those bass pictures it seems like your are a bass addict or something!!!!
Thats a good one Dan...   Thanks everyone for the warm welcome , I feel like family already
(REPLY SEVERELY EDITED)   Great intro Sir.  Can't wait to see more.  Welcome!
Hey, welcome aboard! Thats a nice mixed bag of fish in your pics, good stuff!
I can't believe I missed your intro Paul   .....Welcome aboard to a great site!!.....oh, and here's a better pic of your 1st Muskie standing beside your one and only Ottawa River Muskie guide
Welcome Paul, nice fish and congrats on the PB 'ski.
Sorry my dear friend but this is the pic of choice
